'''Warren Special Edition: The Lord of the Rings''' is a picture book by [[wikipedia:Warren Publishing|Warren Publishing]] as a tie-in to [[Ralph Bakshi]]'s ''[[The Lord of the Rings (1978 film)|The Lord of the Rings]]''. It features several interviews and short articles, as well as a retelling of the story with artwork from the movie.

==Contents==
* "Realm of the Rings: A Legend for Our Time": an introduction into modern mythology and fantasy
* "Warriors of the Ring: Leading Characters of the Odyssey": short profiles on [[Gandalf]], [[Frodo Baggins]], [[Bilbo Baggins]], [[Aragorn]], [[Legolas]] and  [[Boromir]]
* "J.R.R. Tolkien's The Lord of the Rings: A Fantasy Film": the story of the film with images
* "Ward of the Rings: J.R.R. Tolkien, the Mayor of Middle-earth": short biographical sketch of Tolkien
* "Zaentz Perserve Us! The Producer of The Lord of the Rings": biographical sketch and interview with [[Saul Zaentz]]
* "Lord of the Rotoscope: Bakshi's Brainchild":  biographical sketch and interview with [[Ralph Bakshi]]
* Advertisements: 
** [[The Lord of the Rings Sculpture Banks]]
** Buttons
** ''[[The Lord of the Rings Combat Game]]''
** [[The Lord of the Rings Gollum Puzzle]]
** [[The Lord of the Rings Gandalf Puzzle]]
** [[The Lord of the Rings Soundtrack]] by [[Leonard Rosenman]]
** Posters
** T-shirts

==See also==
